name: Kinnek, Inc.
description: Operator of an online marketplace for high-cost purchases designed to find suppliers and manage purchasing. The company's online marketplace for high-cost purchases offers a curated way to research equipment or supplies, enabling businesses to seamlessly connect with suppliers.
one_liner: Operator of an online marketplace for high-cost purchases designed to find suppliers and manage purchasing. The company's online marketplace for high-cost purchases offers a curated way to research equipment or supplies, enabling businesses to seamlessly connect with suppliers.
